entry.summary: Python decorators provide an easy yet powerful syntax for modifying and extending the behavior of functions in your code. entry.title: A Simple Guide To Retrieval Augmented Generation Language Models
entry.summary: Language models have shown impressive capabilities. But that doesn’t mean they’re without faults, as anyone who has witnessed a ChatGPT “hallucination” can attest. In this article, Joas Pambou diagnoses the symptoms that cause hallucinations and explains not only what RAG is but also different approaches for using it to solve language model limitations.

entry.title: ACID Databases – Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation & Durability Explained
entry.summary: ACID stands for Atomicity, Consistency, Isolation and Durability. entry.title: Serverless Architecture Patterns and Best Practices
entry.summary: Serverless architecture has become a hot topic in the developer world, and for good reason. It promises a paradigm shift – one where we leave behind the burdens of server management and focus solely on building and deploying code. No more provisioning VMs, patching software, or scaling infrastructure manually.
